meanings: as if[though], as, just like[as], as...as
Noun (시위를 위한) 가두 행진, 가두 시위 (→demonstration)
Noun (분쟁 중의) 국경, 경계; [보통 pl.] 경계 지방(cf. BORDER, FRONTIER); [the M~es] (잉글랜드와 스코틀랜드 또는 웨...

vlive.korean: 이것은 마치... 원스의 출근길 느낌일까? Is this what going to work feels like for ONCE? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “MORE & MORE” Comeback Week #3
vlive.english: Is this what going to work feels like for ONCE?

vlive.korean: [마치 아마추어 대회에 프로가 출전한 느낌] 저런 애 빼야 되는 거 아니야? [Like a professional player in an amateur contest] We need to exclude him. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [Like a professional player in an amateur contest] We need to exclude him.

vlive.korean: 마치... 이거 뭐예요? It's like... What is this? 듣기 View video SF9 : 맛점
시원이 같은 경우는 마치... As for SiWon, he was... 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 푸르게 빛나던 슈퍼주니어-K.R.Y.의 계절🌿
[이건 마치 쏘리의 늪...] 동물? [Swamp of sorry] Animal? 듣기 View video TWICE : 급식단 Reloaded "급식단의 특별수업" EP.02

examples.korean: It looks like televised trials are here to stay. 발음듣기 텔레비전으로 중계되는 재판이 마치 우리 생활의 일부가 된 것 같다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It looks like televised trials are here to stay. 발음

examples.korean: The fire was banked up as high as if it were midwinter. 발음듣기 마치 한겨울이라도 되는 것처럼 불 위에는 땔감이 잔뜩 쌓아 올려져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fire was banked up as high as if it were midwinter. 발음

examples.korean: It’s like a furnace in here! 발음듣기 이 안은 마치 용광로[찜통] 같군! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s like a furnace in here! 발음

examples.korean: He looked as if he had seen a ghost. 발음듣기 그는 마치 귀신이라도 본 사람 같았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He looked as if he had seen a ghost. 발음

examples.korean: She took to flying like a natural. 발음듣기 그녀는 마치 타고난 듯이 비행에 빠져들었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She took to flying like a natural. 발음
